name: 2nd International Conference and Exhibition on Polymer Science and Technology
content: A warm welcome from Outlook Conferences!!! Polymer Science-2020 heartily invites participants from everywhere the globe to "2nd International Conference and Exhibition on Polymer Science and Technology" scheduled on the following date May 18-19 2020, in Athens, Greece which will give a worldwide stage to talk and present your research work on the relevant topics of Polymer Science and Technology. Themed “Expedite the trending polymer innovations for solving societal challenges”
